thread.title: Baytex Energy to Suspend Dividend, Curb Spending Plans
thread.title_full: Baytex Energy to Suspend Dividend, Curb Spending Plans - WSJ

author: Carolyn King
title: Baytex Energy to Suspend Dividend, Curb Spending Plans
text:
Baytex Energy Corp. said late Thursday it was suspending its dividend and curbing spending plans, becoming the latest Canadian energy company to take further steps to ensure the sustainability of its operations as oil prices continue to slump.
The Calgary, Alberta-based oil and gas producer said it wonâ€™t pay a monthly dividend after the Sept. 15 payment already declared. It also said it will defer work on its heavy oil program in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
